original_title: Etats-Unis : aux frontières de la violence
overview: On January 6, 2021, Americans were shocked to see the images of the Capitol under siege, stormed by thousands of Donald Trump supporters. Novelist Russell Banks, civil rights leader Reverend Al Sharpton, historian Eric Foner and segregation expert Richard Rothstein speak out about the event.
title: Etats-Unis : aux frontières de la violence
